rental

Class RentalAgency

  • java.lang.Object
    • rental.RentalAgency
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SuspiciousRentalAgency

    public class RentalAgency
extends java.lang.Object
    a rental vehicle agency, client can rent one vehicle at a time

      • rentVehicule

        public float rentVehicule(Client client,
                 Vehicle v)
                   throws java.util.NoSuchElementException,
                          java.lang.IllegalStateException
        client rents a vehicle
        Parameters:
        client - the renter
        v - the rented vehicle
        Returns:
        the daily rental price
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if v is not a vehcile of this agency
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if v is already rented or client rents already another vehicle
